title: Percy Jackson... - [Book 1] The Lightning Thief (Chapters)
description:
Audio Book
Percy Jackson And The Olympians: The Lighning Thief
Book 1

Format:     .MP3
Bitrate:    128 kbps

Track Info
Written By Rick Riordan
Read By Jesse Bernstein
22 Chapters Total


*Note: -- I took a lot of time and put a lot of effort into combining files other users uploaded into individual chapters, and decided this deserves to be shared.  
It is my hope that if quality audio books are made readily availabe for sharing, more people will listen to them on their mobile devices, and enrich themselves, instead of only listening to music or playing games or watching tube videos of dumb stuff.  It was also my hopes that dividing these books into chapters will make it easier for people to keep track of their place, and for them to be better able to decide when they've reached a good stopping point if they have to take a break from reading.  


I plan to have many more audio books uploaded in the near future.
